title: Getting Started with Python
description: Introduction to syntax, print statements, and running your first code.

title: Variables and Data Types
description: Learn about variables, strings, numbers, and booleans.

title: Conditionals and Loops
description: Master if-else, while loops, and for loops with practical examples.

title: Functions and Scope
description: Understand how to create and use functions, parameters, and return values.

title: Lists and Arrays
description: Explore Python lists and how arrays are used in real problems.

title: Searching and Sorting
description: Implement linear search, binary search, and basic sorting algorithms.

title: Stacks and Queues
description: Learn about LIFO and FIFO data structures and where they are used.

title: Linked Lists
description: Understand node-based dynamic lists and their operations.

title: Hash Maps (Dictionaries)
description: Use dictionaries to store and retrieve data efficiently.
